examples.example: 科学家们一直在努力研究新的科技成果，以推动社会的进步。

translate.english: Scientists have been constantly striving to research new scientific and technological achievements to promote the progress of society.

examples.example: 我一直热衷于对历史文化的研究，从中感受到了无尽的乐趣和收获。

translate.english: I have always been keen on the research of historical culture and felt endless fun and gains from it.

examples.example: 我和同事们一直在认真研究更好的工作方法，以提升工作效率。

translate.english: My colleagues and I have been seriously studying better working methods to improve work efficiency.
